objective: Implement Dispatcher to convert single-sentence requirement into an ordered OES task list (serial planning).
implementation_guide: 1. Create Dispatcher class with plan(requirement: str) -> List[OESTask]. 2. Follow OES JSON Schema in docs/06-oes-spec.md. 3. Unit tests ≥80% coverage. 4. Demo CLI: tianting plan "build todo app". 5. Update docs/modules/dispatcher/design.md.
success_criteria: Given a sample requirement, Dispatcher returns deterministic ordered list matching schema; all tests pass; benchmark ≤50ms.
